Html.content: To add a new language, say Czech (locale cs), to the spellchecker, you have to add a new field definition to the managed-schema of the spellchecker's Solr core. The managed-schema is found under ${WEBAPP_HOME}/WEB-INF/solr/spellcheck/conf/. Just add the new field with the same attributes as the already existing fields, as done in line 17 in the managed-schema shown below.
